Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - Yesterday, we slaughtered them and we will continue to slaughter them

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - Our initial assessment is that they will all die

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - We will push those crooks, those mercenaries back into the swamp

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - We butchered the force present at the airport, we are destroying them

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - Today, the tide has turned, we are destroying them

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - The United Nations is a place for prostitution under the feet of Americans

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - There are no American infidels in Baghdad. Never!

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - We will welcome them with bullets and shoes

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: One should eat to live, not live to eat

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: I live on good soup, not on fine words

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: The duty of comedy is to correct men by amusing them

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfect reason flees all extremity, and leads one to be wise with sobriety

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the noises known to man, opera is the most expensive

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: If you suppress grief too much, it can well redouble

Quote.Author: Moliere
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not only for what we do that we are held responsible, but also for what we do not do

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: Satire is traditionally the weapon of the powerless against the powerful

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always found it easier to be funny than to be serious

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: Good thing we've still got politics in Texas - finest form of free entertainment ever invented

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: Many a time freedom has been rolled back - and always for the same sorry reason: fear

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't ignore politics, no matter how much you'd like to

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: Being slightly paranoid is like being slightly pregnant - it tends to get worse

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in practicing prudence at least once every two or three years

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that ignorance is the root of all evil. And that no one knows the truth

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: I never saw anything funnier than Texas politics

Quote.Author: Molly Ivins
Quote.QuoteValue: The stakes they play for in politics are paper and money. The chips they play with are your life

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: We all need illusions. That's why we love movies

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: Time destroys everything

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel fine and comfortable with myself, but not because I'm beautiful

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lucky person because I've been loved a lot. I have a great family

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: When a relationship doesn't work anymore, it's terrible to stay with someone that you don't love

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: Being an actress is the sublimation of feminity

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man sees a woman with red lipstick, he admires her, but often he won't feel like kissing her

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor works with their soul and their thought

Quote.Author: Monica Bellucci
Quote.QuoteValue: Envy is human nature

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to guarantee a loss is to quit

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: As you grow in this business, you learn how to do more with less

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to thank everybody and anybody who ever had anything to do with the making of this picture

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want a Black History Month. Black history is American history

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me something interesting to play and I'm happy

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: This kid came up with Napster, and before that, none of us thought of content protection

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I gravitate towards gravitas

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: People need to start to think about the messages that they send in the movies

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Just that working with Clint again is like coming home

Quote.Author: Morgan Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the blues a lot. I grew up on it

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not look upon this world with fear and loathing. Bravely face whatever the gods offer

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Your spirit is the true shield

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: A good stance and posture reflect a proper state of mind

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Create each day anew

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: Progress comes to those who train and train; reliance on secret techniques will get you nowhere

Quote.Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote.QuoteValue: The divine is not something high above us. It is in heaven, it is in earth, it is inside us

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm cursed with the gift of foresight

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's full of tricky snakes and ladders

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think it's possible to go through life and never fall in love, or find someone who loves you

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Peru, Peru. My heart's lighthouse

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Long hair is an unpardonable offence which should be punishable by death

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Racism is beyond common sense and has no place in our society

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Artists aren't really people. And I'm actually 40 per cent papier mache

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Reggae is vile

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I would find the idea of compiling a setlist that doesn't wildly excite me to be too restricting

Quote.Author: Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: The fire in the belly is essential, otherwise you become Michael Buble - famous and meaningless

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Love without conversation is impossible

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: The telephone book is full of facts, but it doesn't contain a single idea

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Not to engage in the pursuit of ideas is to live like ants instead of like men

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is a very taxing and arduous form of leisure activity

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, we wish the joy of perfect union with the person we love

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is toil: what one does only to earn a living. If it gives pleasure, it is leisure

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless we love and are loved, each of us is alone, each of us is deeply lonely

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: We love even when our love is not requited

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship

Quote.Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I got three meals a day. Oatmeal, miss-a-meal and no meal

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like magic - but I have been known to make guys disappear

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in the Golden Rule - The Man with the Gold... Rules

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't worry. I don't doubt. I'm daring. I'm a rebel

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was growing up, my family was so poor we couldn't afford to pay attention

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: You might not have the things you want, but if you check carefully, you got all you need

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Christian - I really don't believe in UFOs

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama's not Jesus. He can't walk on water

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: Back in the day, I would wear up to 45 pounds of gold. It would take me four hours to get dressed!

Quote.Author: Mr. T
Quote.QuoteValue: Gold was a gift to Jesus. If it's good enough for Jesus, it's good enough for me!

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Nations are born in the hearts of poets, they prosper and die in the hands of politicians

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Words, without power, is mere philosophy

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Thou art not for the earth, nor for the Heaven the world is for thee, thou art not for the world

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexual self-restraint is only a preliminary stage in the ego's evolution

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Plants and minerals are bound to predestination. The faithful is only bound to the Divine orders

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Divine life is in touch with the whole universe on the analogy of the soul's contact with the body

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: The thought of a limit to perceptual space and time staggers the mind

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: Islam is itself destiny and will not suffer destiny

Quote.Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul is neither inside nor outside the body; neither proximate to nor separate from it

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything happens in Grand Prix racing, and it usually does

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can cut the tension with a cricket stump

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: IF is a very long word in Formula One; in fact, IF is F1 spelled backwards

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: And now, excuse me while I interrupt myself

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in five years time, he will still be four years younger than Damon Hill

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make mistakes. I make prophecies which immediately turn out to be wrong

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: I should imagine that the conditions in the cockpit are totally unimaginable

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: The lead car is unique, except for the one behind it which is identical

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: This circuit is interesting because it has inclines and declines. Not just up, but down as well

Quote.Author: Murray Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, now we have exactly the same situation as at the beginning of the race, only exactly opposite

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is bothered about an institution more than its alumni

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: A great leader also has the ability to make people an inch taller in his presence

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Entrepreneurship is all about deferred gratification

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always looked at my competencies before accepting any responsibility

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: If England became a world power, it was because of the industrial revolution

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is about unravelling nature

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to mesh the voices of people with expertise and meritocracy

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, the biggest bottleneck to the growth of a corporation is availability of good talent

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always enjoyed mathematics. It is the most precise and concise way of expressing any idea

Quote.Author: N. R. Narayana Murthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a man in a hurry

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: Hard work has made it easy. That is my secret. That is why I win

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most difficult times in my life was when I escaped from Romania in November of 1989

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very hard to get to the top. It's hardest to stay at the top

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: You should also appreciate the goodness around you, and surround yourself with positive people

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: I worked hard in gymnastics since the time I was six years old until I retired at 23 years of age

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents were very loving, but disciplinarians

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: My marriage to my husband, Bart Conner in 1996 is my proudest personal moment

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do today is because of what I did when I was 14

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought I was going to retire at 20, and I was going to be a surgeon

Quote.Author: Nadia Comaneci
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a wonderful country with wonderful people

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: A desert is a place without expectation

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is change; we measure its passing by how much things alter

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: A child understands fear, and the hurt and hate it brings

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Responsibility is what awaits outside the Eden of Creativity

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is something of which I am convinced there is no innocence this side of the womb

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no moral authority like that of sacrifice

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: The facts are always less than what really happened

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot live with someone who can't live without me

Quote.Author: Nadine Gordimer
Quote.QuoteValue: People give one another things that can't be gift wrapped

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I myself am a former commando fighter

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: The Land of Israel goes with the Torah of Israel under the sovereignty of the State of Israel

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Netanyahu supports - and he truly does support - building a Palestinian state within Israel

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people appreciate honesty

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: When you negotiate with terrorists, you get more terror

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: The Palestinian Authority has become the biggest terror body in the world

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent most of my career in hi tech, not in politics

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the world to understand that a Palestinian state means no Israeli state. That's the equation

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to change things, it requires bravery

Quote.Author: Naftali Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: I myself have felt the wrath of the media, but that's part of what a good democracy is

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: God did not intend religion to be an exercise club

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: The criminal is trying to solve his immediate problems

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's interpretations of religion are often backward and contradict the needs of civilization

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: Events at home, at work, in the street - these are the bases for a story

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a government employee in the morning and a writer in the evening

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: If we reject science, we reject the common man

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife thought I deserved it, but I always thought the Nobel a Western prize

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: The Koran and the laws of all civilized nations legislate against the vilification of religions

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: If the urge to write should ever leave me, I want that day to be my last

Quote.Author: Naguib Mahfouz
Quote.QuoteValue: At my age it is unseemly to be pessimistic

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - People can't even imagine that it's possible to succeed anymore

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - Some Muslim students experience secularism as an act of aggression

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - Compared to some of our neighbours, it's not frowned upon to be a mother and work in France

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - Equality in education is my number one battle

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - It is not just family that must transmit values, but school also

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - I was very shy and reserved, so it was a bit contradictory to get into politics

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - The education ministry files suit every time there is a case of identity fraud

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - My dream of society is a society where women are free and proud of their bodies

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - Reading changes your perspective and feeds your imagination

Quote.Author: Najat Vallau
Quote.QuoteValue: elkacem - There is no link between the terror attacks of Daesh and the dress of a woman on the beach

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is changing quickly and we must be ready to change with it or risk being left behind

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: Prostitution and corruption are two things that mankind has had to live with for so long

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: My priority is to ensure peace and harmony in Malaysia. That is uppermost in my mind

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: You must make sure that the majority of the people are not marginalized

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: The word 'change' has been abused so many times

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: Detention without trial is history in Malaysia

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: We can transform the government and the economy, as well as democracy, in Malaysia

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: The disappearance of MH370 has tested our collective resolve

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: We have lost a lot of ground to the extremists in the Middle East

Quote.Author: Najib Razak
Quote.QuoteValue: As you know with the Arab Spring, there were no dividends

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: My popularity plunged three years ago and I didn't try to court publicity

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: Up until now, I had ideas that I wanted to try but didn't have the opportunity to do them

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: Simply, there are many things I would like to do

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: From my debut until now, I've always wanted to sing and dance

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, on nights that I can't sleep, I play video games alone until the morning

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: Even where friendship is concerned, it takes me a long time to trust people

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: Even my closest friend said I was finished, but I think I may be a little different from the others

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: I came back to do a live concert. Nobody had done that before and I know my managers were worried

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: I stopped caring what people thought

Quote.Author: Namie Amuro
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, there was a huge gap between what I wanted to do and what I could do as an idol

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: One reason why I don't drink is because I wish to know when I am having a good time

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I like about rich people is their money

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: I married beneath me, all women do

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: The main dangers in this life are the people who want to change everything... or nothing

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have got to make the world safe for men since men have made it so darned unsafe for women

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: The penalty of success is to be bored by people who used to snub you

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: The first time Adam had a chance, he laid the blame on women

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to admit that I am more than fifty-two, even if that does make my sons illegitimate

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: My vigor, vitality and cheek repel me. I am the kind of woman I would run from

Quote.Author: Nancy Astor
Quote.QuoteValue: Pioneers may be picturesque figures, but they are often rather lonely ones

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is a tool, influence is a skill; one is a fist, the other a fingertip

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: A typical smart phone has more computing power than Apollo 11 when it landed a man on the moon

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always been a luxury to be able to hop a plane to Paris, to Venice, to the Grand Canyon

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes justice is at its most merciful when it's blind

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: All wars, even the noblest, bring a reckoning of means and ends

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Making distinctions is part of learning. So is making mistakes

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Hillary Clinton wants to leave behind No Child Left Behind

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Harriet Tubman and Sojourner Truth were slaves by birth, freedom fighters by temperament

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is valuable; people are busy

Quote.Author: Nancy Gibbs
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny how things change slowly, until the day we realize they've changed completely

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the truth is black-and-white

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: I have 'To Kill A Mockingbird' signed by Harper Lee. That is my prized possession

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: Look, the justice system is made up of people. People have faults. It's not perfect

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: If I listened to my critics, I would still be at home under my bed right now

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: I majored in Shakespearean studies at a very tiny school in Georgia

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a railroad man his entire life; 43 years for Southern Railroad

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard for me to believe someone could harm a child

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: What joy would I get from putting the wrong person behind bars?

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not favor the gag order

Quote.Author: Nancy Grace
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really want to have any part of getting guilty people off

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't underestimate your opponent, but don't overestimate them, either

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: The impact of climate change is a tremendous risk to the security and well-being of our countries

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't vote, you don't count

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care how popular I am. I'm not putting myself out there to run for higher office

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans deserve a better tomorrow, today

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: America must be a light to the world, not just a missile

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Every month that we do not have an economic recovery package 500 million Americans lose their jobs

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: We in Congress stand by Israel. In Congress, we speak with one voice on the subject of Israel

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Jobs are central to the American dream - and President Obama has focused on jobs from day one

Quote.Author: Nancy Pelosi
Quote.QuoteValue: The American dream is about freedom

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't intend for this to take on a political tone. I'm just here for the drugs

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a big believer that eventually everything comes back to you. You get back what you give out

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I must say acting was good training for the political life which lay ahead for us

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: As I've said before, time is short, and life is precious

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: It is true that when you're in the White House alone, it is a lonely place. Big and lonely

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been very happy with my homes, but homes really are no more than the people who live in them

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: My life really began when I married my husband

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: The movies were custard compared to politics

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had quite a life, when you stop and think about it

Quote.Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism is the ability to choose what you want to do

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: My features are completely ethnic

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a temper. A temper is an emotion

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I live my life day by day, and that's how I continue to live it

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I was born beautiful. I just think I was born me

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I work very hard and I'm worth every cent

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst was when my skirt fell down to my ankles, but I had on thick tights underneath

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: After Versace was murdered, the first person to call me was Mandela

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are our future we must take care of them with maximum effort

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no regrets. I've got my health

Quote.Author: Naomi Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I make a lot of money, but I don't want to talk about that

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Solitude is creativity's best friend, and solitude is refreshment for our souls

Quote.Author: Naomi Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many paths but only one journey
